title: 07/08/21 DPS Hour 1 Dennis Krause
itunes:title: 07/08/21 DPS Hour 1 Dennis Krause
description:
Jason Smith and Ryan Hollins, in for Dan, discuss Game 1 of the NBA Finals and break down what the Bucks can do to get back into the series. The guys explain how the Bucks can stop Chris Paul, and Ryan tells you why he believes CP3 will finally don a Lakers jersey next season. Bucks Radio Color Analyst and Packers Pregame Radio Host Dennis Krause joins the guys to talk Giannis Antetokounmpo's return from injury and what his expectations are for Aaron Rodgers reporting to the team. Plus, Jason tells you why Trevor Bauer has thrown his last pitch of 2021.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
